title: Somazone (MAC & PC)
creator_credit: Richard Jones, Tom Olsson, Electric Alchemy, National Asthma Campaign, Legal Aid Commission of Victoria, Quit, Human Services and Cinemedia
brief_description: SomaZone is about exploring, experimenting and making choices. It’s a “Life-Simulator” which gives teenagers a chance for real decision-making. By creating a “personal body”, users can take risks and see what happens. SomaZone is a multimedia package designed to look at health, society and the law from the perspective of adolescents. Discussion notes are included in the CD in WORD format. Technical requirements: Will run on PC and MAC. PC’s need Windows 3.1 or later; 486 - 66 CPU; 6MB of free RAM; 2 x CD-ROM drive; SVGA (256 colours); 16 bit Soundblaster or compatible; Quicktime for Windows 2.1.2 (supplied). Macintosh: System 7 or later; 030 - 30MHz; 6 MB of free Ram; 2 x CD-ROM drive; 256 colours; Quicktime 2.5 supplied.
